    • show_inGamePlayers

      void show_inGamePlayers(LinkedHashMap<String,Boolean> players)
      Display the in-game players and their statuses. Sent both when a player join and when a player quit
      Parameters:
      players - a map of player usernames to their statuses

    • show_invalidAction

      void show_invalidAction(String message)
      Notify of an invalid action with a message.
      Parameters:
      message - the message describing the invalid action

    • show_GameIsOver

      void show_GameIsOver(String username, Map<String,Integer> playersScore)
      At the end of the match show the name of the winner and the scores of the in game players
      Parameters:
      username - String containing the name of the winner
      playersScore - Map of Players names with their relatives score

    • receiveToken

      void receiveToken(int token, boolean temporary)
      Method used to allow the client to save his temporary token on the first response with the server or the game token, used to identify the game the player was disconnected from
      Parameters:
      token - number of the token received
      temporary - if the token received is temporary or not

    • show_heartBeat

      void show_heartBeat()
      Show a response from the server to the client heartbeat. Could be used to show the ping

    • show_wantReconnect

      void show_wantReconnect(String username)
      Response from the server to an already connected player doing a new connection Client is supposed to be asked if they want to reconnect or not upon receiving this method
      Parameters:
      username - Old username retrieved from server

    • show_rejoined

      void show_rejoined(boolean result, List<String> players)
      Upon Client command of rejoin or not this method notify the client of the result of the operation providing the list of the players in game in case the result is true. if the result is false the client will be asked to log in again
      Parameters:
      result - true if client wants to reconnect to server, false otherwise
      players - List of players username (Used in gui to load the Game Scene)

    • show_timerLastPlayerConnected

      void show_timerLastPlayerConnected(Integer secondsLeft)
      A countDown is shown if it is detected that only one player is left in the match If the countdown reach zero, the last player is the winner. Method is called repeatedly showing how may seconds are left
      Parameters:
      secondsLeft - Integer representing the seconds left (on the server countdown)

    • show_unableToReconnect

      void show_unableToReconnect()
      Method called if no previous game was detected. The client should proceed to log in for the first time
